SELECT a.id, s.sch_name as schName, a.school_id as schoolId, a.image_url as imageUrl, max(a.is_start) as isStart, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, com.comments as comments FROM vd_live a left join se_school s on a.school_id = s.id left join (SELECT count( c.id ) as comments, c.school_id FROM site_comment c WHERE c.comment_type = 1 AND c.comment_category = 1 GROUP BY c.school_id) com on a.school_id = com.school_id
a.del_flag = '0'
#{schoolId}
group by a.school_id

SELECT a.id, a.image_url as imageUrl, v.eq_area as eqArea FROM vd_live a left join vd_equipment v on a.eq_id = v.id
a.del_flag = '0' and a.school_id = #{schoolId}

SELECT a.id, s.sch_name as schName, a.school_id as schoolId, a.image_url as imageUrl, a.is_start as isStart, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, com.comments as comments FROM vd_live a left join se_school s on a.school_id = s.id left join (SELECT count( c.id ) as comments, c.school_id FROM site_comment c WHERE c.comment_type = 1 AND c.comment_category = 1 GROUP BY c.school_id) com on a.school_id = com.school_id
a.del_flag = '0' and a.id = #{liveId}

a.del_flag = '0' and a.school_id = #{schoolId}
